extsInput.title: Supported Media Types Extensions
extsInput.name: extsInput
extsInput.description:
Only input media types are allowed to be uploaded to Media Kit.
Each extension can be split using the ',' symbols. Not allowed to contain ‘*’. If this item is empty, then .jpeg, .png, .gif, .svg, .webp, .bmp, .ico will be allowed.

maxUploadSize.title: Maximum File Upload Size
maxUploadSize.name: maxUploadSize
maxUploadSize.description: Set the max upload size limit when uploading files(should be a valid byte string, examples: 1MB, 200kb). If empty, not limit max upload size.

checkReferer.title: Hotlink Protection (Beta)
checkReferer.description: When Hotlink Protection is enabled, only requests from blocklet trusted domains can access the resources.
checkReferer.name: checkReferer
